commit.message:
re PR libstdc++/27404 (Rope iterators are not InputIterators)

2006-05-04  Douglas Gregor  <dgregor@cs.indiana.edu>

	PR libstdc++/27404
	* include/ext/rope (_Rope_const_iterator<>::operator*() const,
	_Rope_iterator<>::operator*() const): Add.

From-SVN: r113519

files.patch:
